"Read Fed Files"
filename file path csv file produced FED3

function read raw data column specifications (see `fed_col_types()`). append `datetime` formatting FED's clock datetime `yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS`, also extract `year`, `month`, `day` date. parse session `filename` append resulting `data.frame`.

what:
This function recalculates pellets if given a FED_data `data.frame` that contains an identifier column `ID`
The basic thought behind it is that one animal can receive more than one FED device
This might happen due to the experiment design or because a FED needed to be replaced during the experiment — recalculate_pellets
